name: DC Comics, Superman, Green Lantern, Hawkgirl, and Mr. Terrific 4-Pack, 12-Inch Action Figure Set, Superhero Toys for Kids Ages 4 and Up
short_description: HEROIC ADVENTURES AWAIT: Bring epic battles to life with this 4-pack of 12-inch action figures, including Superman, Green Lantern, Hawkgirl, and Mr. Terrific, perfect for thrilling superhero storytelling
11 POINTS OF ARTICULATION: Each figure features 11 points of articulation and authentic movie-inspired details, allowing kids to create exciting battles, rescues, and daring missions
IMAGINATION AND STORYTELLING: Kids can team up their favorite superheroes to craft bold rescue missions, face off against villains, and dream up endless stories of heroism and adventure

EXPAND THE SUPERHERO FUN: Pair this set with a Superman Power Cape Set, Fortress of Solitude Battle Set, plush toys, or other Superman action figures (each sold separately) to create the ultimate superhero world
product_description: Get ready for action-packed adventures with the DC Comics 4-Pack Action Figure Set! Featuring Superman, Green Lantern, Hawkgirl, and Mr. Terrific, these 12-inch figures are designed for thrilling battles, daring rescues, and endless storytelling fun. Each figure comes with 11 points of articulation and movie-inspired details, making them perfect for dynamic poses and heroic moments. Kids can team up their heroes to save the day, take on villains, or invent brand-new missions filled with courage and creativity. Whether it’s for a birthday, holiday, or everyday fun, the DC Comics 4-Pack is the ultimate gift for young superhero fans. Add to the excitement by pairing these figures with a Superman Power Cape, Fortress of Solitude Battle Set, or other Superman toys (each sold separately) to create a full superhero universe.

Crafted with authentic SUPERMAN movie styling, these figures capture the essence of iconic Super Heroes and Super-Villains, ready to take on any challenge. Whether saving the world or clashing with foes, these action figures inspire endless fun for Super Heroes fans of all ages. Expand the adventure by collecting characters like Superman, Mr. Terrific, Metamorpho, Green Lantern, Engineer, Hawkgirl, and more (each sold separately). Perfect for birthdays, holidays, or just because, these 6-Inch Action Figures are a must-have for young fans and collectors who dream of heroism. Bring home the legend and let the adventures begin!

name: DC Comics, Metal Force Superman Action Figure, 12-Inch Extra Large Super Hero Collectible Kids Toys for Boys and Girls Ages 4 and Up
short_description: MASSIVE 12-INCH FIGURES: Towering at an impressive 12 inches, these Metal Force Superman and Batman figures are bigger and better than ever, perfect for display or dynamic play
METAL FORCE ARMOR: Each Metal Force figure features stunning metallic details that showcase the heroic armor and strength of your favorite DC Super Heroes
BUILD YOUR BATMAN COLLECTION: With a giant-sized version of Superman and Batman to collect – these Metal Force figures are a must-have for Batman fans
EXCLUSIVE COLLECTIBLE CHARACTER CARD Each set includes unique metal collector cards featuring each character. Collect all 21 cards to complete your series
GIFT FOR KIDS: Kids love to use their imagination and create their own Super Hero storylines with Batman toys Superhero toys are the ultimate Easter basket stuffers and toy gifts for boys and girls
Includes: 1 Figure, 1 Metal Card, 1 Card Base
product_description: Dive into Adventure with Metal Force Batman and Superman! Welcome to the thrilling world of DC with our exclusive 12-Inch Extra Large Metal Force Heroes Action Figures. Experience the might of the unstoppable Batman and Superman, brought to life with stunning metallic finishes that elevate these icons to new heights. Each figure stands a commanding 12 inches tall, sporting Metal Force armor, making them not only toys but standout centerpieces in any Super Hero collection. Unleash your imagination and bring the epic tales of Gotham City and Metropolis right into your home. Children and collectors alike will admire the exquisite detail and dynamic poses of these figures, perfect for recreating famous battles or dreaming up new feats of heroism. Whether lined up on a shelf or standing ready for action, Batman and Superman are poised for endless adventures. Double the excitement and complete your epic team-up with both Metal Force Batman and Superman. Together, they don’t just add to your collection—they transform it, creating a vivid panorama of bravery and action that captivates and delights. Collect, play, and display—immerse yourself in the world of DC with Metal Force Heroes and let the legacy of these legendary figures inspire stories of valor and virtue. Elevate your playtime and showcase with the ultimate symbols of justice, the Metal Force Batman and Superman!
